version_description: Resolve for Crash of login.

1. Brand new interface, upgrade and experience now;
2. Create your fishing spot with brief and easier operation;
3. More comprehensive tide data, even offline available;
4. Easy to get hebdomadal weather variation;

1. Known bugs fixed for more stability;
2. Urdu and Filipino language added.

1. Fixed iOS 7 login crash;
2. Known bugs fixed for more stability;

- Free upgrade of tide to 7 days and weather forecast
- Brand new interface with optimized interactive experience
- Add data of water temperature/swell/sea level altitude
- Support tide weather search of random location on the map
- Add search function of city/port/island/lake
- Add reminder function of updated weather
- Add functions of Catches account login and locations sync
- Add supports of Google Map and Amap
- Support over 28 languages

Notice: New version cancels the login of Global Tide independent account and transfers the membership of original account to Catches. Please download the latest version of Catches to sync original spots data.

Errors and crashes fixed to enhance stability.
Please upgrade to the latest version for better experience!

1. Re-upgrade home page, increase location analysis in hot spot near by, convenient to look up data analysis of local tidal weather.

2 Add function of spot monitoring, users are able to look up tide, weather of the closest fishing spot that users created and collected personally and the distance between fishing spot and wave monitoring station.

3. add offline tidal package, users are able to download offline tidal packages and check tidal weather at anytime and in anywhere.

Global tide adopts the new interface, increases the offline data packets (global islands/lake/port and other information) and functions such as downloading and sharing and collecting nearby places, adds predict data such as water temperature, air quality, ultraviolet light and the motion index. We also offer an option of upgrading to the permanent member, upgrading tidal Predict range to the whole year. If you want to continue to use the 7-day tide real-time prediction function for free, please download and use the CATCHES APP. Now you can check the position of the tide/weather/wave monitoring station at any location on the map for easy to compare data. The global tide will operate independently from version 4.0, and the account data will no longer be synchronized with the CATCH. Please contact us if you have any questions. Thanks for your continued support and love, wish you a happy sports experience.

Contact us
Email: support@solot.com
Facebook：Global Tide

Global tide adopts the new interface, increases the offline data packets (global islands/lake/port and other information) and functions such as downloading and sharing and collecting nearby places, adds predict data such as water temperature, air quality, ultraviolet light and the motion index，and adds the function of entering coordinates to find spots manually . We also offer an option of upgrading to the permanent member, upgrading tidal Predict range to the whole year. If you want to continue to use the 7-day tide real-time prediction function for free, please download and use the CATCHES APP. Now you can check the position of the tide/weather/wave monitoring station at any location on the map for easy to compare data. The global tide will operate independently from version 4.0, and the account data will no longer be synchronized with the CATCH. Please contact us if you have any questions. Thanks for your continued support and love, wish you a happy sports experience.
Contact us
Email: support@solot.com
Facebook：Global Tide
